SEEALSO: SpreadsheetAddColumn, SpreadsheetAddImage, SpreadsheetAddRow, SpreadsheetDeleteRow, SpreadsheetDeleteRows, SpreadsheetFormatRow, SpreadsheetFormatRows, SpreadsheetShiftRows
DESCRIPTION: Sets document properties for a new spreadsheet or modifies properties for an existing spreadsheet.
EXAMPLE:
<cfspreadsheet action="read" src="#filename#" name="a"  > 
<cfset info = StructNew()> 
<cfset info.title="Title"> 
<cfset info.category="Category test"> 
<cfset info.author="ABC"> 
<cfset info.comments="Comments for this file"> 
<cfset spreadsheetaddInfo(a,info)> 
<cfspreadsheet action="write" filename="#dirname#SingleSheet.xls" name=a overwrite="yes">
USAGE: This function is supported by Microsoft Office Excel 2007 (.xlsx) and Microsoft Office 2003 (.xls).

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object from which to get the value.
The following properties of the spreadsheet can be modified or set: AUTHOR CATEGORY LASTAUTHOR COMMENTS KEYWORDS MANAGER COMPANY SUBJECT TITLE
